articles.description: The cast of Fresh Prince of Bel-Air were left fighting back the tears on Thursday as they reunited over a video call to pay respect to late co-star James Avery
articles.content:
Will Smith and the rest of the Fresh Prince of Bel-Air cast were reduced to tears during a virtual reunion on Friday.
The stars of the 1990s American sitcom got together for the first time in decades as they paid a heartwarming tribute to Will's on-screen un… [+1997 chars]

articles.title: Britain's Got Talent: Amanda Holden breaks down in tears over heartbreaking audition - Express
articles.description: BRITAIN'S GOT TALENT judge Amanda Holden will be left in tears in this evening's latest batch of auditions when a children's choir take to the stage and perform an emotional song on climate change.

articles.description: The money will "fund grants and scholarships for children of first responders who have been impacted by COVID-19", the pair say.

articles.title: How Star Wars: The Clone Wars’ Music Completely Evolved in “Shattered” - Den of Geek UK
articles.description: The Kevin Kiner score for The Clone Wars season 7 episode "Shattered" will give you chills. Come for the Revenge of the Sith John Williams remix, stay for the freaky synthesizer.
articles.content:
Stream your Star Wars favorites on Disney+ with a FREE TRIAL, on us!
Until season 7 of The Clone Wars, I never actually realized how great Kiners scores can be when hes not just remixing those familiar Star Wars go-tos. In Shattered, the unnerving use of wha… [+2638 chars]

articles.title: Drake – ‘Dark Lane Demo Tapes’ review: business as usual on rapper’s forgettable stop-gap release - NME
articles.description: Drizzy fails to learn the lessons from his previous album, 'Scorpion', on this bloated and unnecessary release, which veers from recycled ideas to duds
articles.content: “Whatever’s in me, it’s takin’ over,” Drake raps on his new mixtapes opening track, Deep Pockets. I gotta bust it down, break it open / Until somebody starts takin’ notice, then we rollin’. These are telling few lines from an artist whose popularity to contro… [+3336 chars]

articles.description: Telethon aired last week.
articles.content:
The BBC has been hit with a large number of complaints over its Big Night In telethon event.
The event last week (April 23) was overseen by Comic Relief and Children In Need as a large number of famous faces popped-up to raise money.
